body: Hi Mostapha. I've been trying the new decomposeByType component, and it seems that internal walls are only recognized when some glazing exists. In the definition below I'm showing the same workflow with and without glazing, but I only get internal walls in the upper one. Thanks again for your huge work. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/DBD4PE5EidU33lYxScH5IdQKMwU2Q4U2J9O*P1wuqv7P185FTuQDZzWhHwEJHEWrfMh726ugdtPl*sdVuT3lm8ulwCcbKfk7/inernalwalls.PNG)
